description: If n-th triangular number (A000217) is odd multiply by 4, if even multiply by 5.
references: Norman Sullivan, Test Your Own IQ, Workman Publishing Co. New York, NY, 1994, pp. 48, 50.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, a=n*(n + 1)/2; if (a%2, a*=4, a*=5); write("b061726.txt", n, " ", a) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 27 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), May 05 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 07 2001
